BESA.Kernel.Agent

  • Classes in BESA.Kernel.Agent used by BESA.Kernel.Agent
    Class
    Description
    AgentBESA
    This class represents an agent in the platform BESA.
    AGENTSTATE
    This a enumeration that contains the possible states of the life cycle of an agent.
    BehaviorBESA
    This class represents a behavior of a BESA agent, to which a series of guards is associated.
    ChannelBESA
    This class represents a channel associated to a BESA agent.
    GuardBESA
    This class represents a guard of an agent.
    KernelAgentExceptionBESA
    This class represents the type exception for the kernell agent.
    MBoxBESA
    This class allows to make the treatment of sent and received events.
    MultiGuardBESA
    This class represents a guard that can have different behaviors for different or for the same agent.
    MultiGuardIndexBESA
    This class represents a subguard that executes itself if its field ack is equal to the event field in DataBESA.
    PortBESA
    This class represents a port BESA, which makes treatment of behaviors, guards and events.
    StateBESA
    This class represents the internal state of the BESA agent.
    StructBESA
    This class is used to define the agent BESA internal structure.
